casebody.data:
HSI
v.
DIVERSIFIED FIRE PROTECTION. No. 232O05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2005. Michael D. Meeker, Clinton R. Pinyan, Caroline R. Heil, Greensboro, for N.C. Construction Co., et al. James W. Sprouse, Jr., James R. Vann, Raleigh, for HSI North Carolina, LLC. Robert L. Burchette, Charlotte, Martin L. White, Durham, for The Carolinas Branch.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2005 by Defendant (N.C. Monroe Construction Co. and Travelers Casualty & Surety Co. of America) for Temporary Stay:

"Dissolve the Stay by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of May 2005."
